question: According to a recent order passed,which Indian language is to get 9000 new words?
explanation: 9,000 new Tamil words will be included in the language. Currently, Tamil has over 4.7 lakh unique words. The government has constituted a committee of experts to coin new Tamil words. The new words in the Tamil language will strengthen stateâ€™s pursuit of excellence in trade, law, administration, technology and medicine.
